snippet: House Republican leaders poised to revive efforts to overhaul the immigration system with new broad policy principles are facing a direct challenge from a GOP senator who is warning against a headlong rush toward reform....

headline.print_headline: House GOP Leaders Face Challenge on Immigration
headline.main: House GOP Leaders Face Challenge on Immigration

lead_paragraph: House Republican leaders poised to revive efforts to overhaul the immigration system with new broad policy principles are facing a direct challenge from a GOP senator who is warning against a headlong rush toward reform.
